q: "What I hope is that Kelsey and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children," her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh, love and happiness in their new marriage. Those are the kinds of good wishes that only a dollar sign followed by a lot of zeroes buys. Kelsey told David Letterman last month that he plans to marry Kayte this month.
